text: Margin Call is a 2011 American independent drama movie. The movie is about insider trading on Wall Street. Demi Moore plays Sarah Robertson. Mary McDonnell plays Mary Rogers. Kevin Spacey plays Sam Rogers. The movie got positive reviews from the movie critics. It was released on October 21, 2011. == Other websites == * Category:2011 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Trading movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:American independent movies Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Margin Call (movie)
